title: Different Flex placements
body:
So I did almost all of my flex games (excluding 1) with two friends (who did all 10 games together) and when we completed our placements I was placed silver 5 (i was silver 5 last season), my friend was placed silver 5 as well (wasn't ranked last season) but my last friend was placed in Bronze 5 (was bronze 2 last season)
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}  
It doesn't make a lot of scene to me so i'm hoping someone can explain or clarify this.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
A few pointers:
-I didn't think MMR was weighed solo heavily on solo performance as this is a team based game
-Even though your supposed to be "lower" than your rank last season i was placed the exact same 
- He wasn't playing poorly, wasnt feeding or getting carried

replies.body: Vast majority end up lower than their end of season rank. If you were placed the same that makes you the minority. Your unranked friend was S5 because fresh ranked accounts start with S4~ mmr. Placement is based on your individual mmr more than what games you won/lost in placements.
but he did well in most of his placements, my friend who got silver 5 even said you were better than me during the game, is it just an unfortunate calculation?

Your fresh friends mmr would have been S4~ when he started placements, whereas you other friend after the soft reset would have been B4~. Lose a little mmr over placements and friend 1 ends up S5 and friend 2 ends up B5. The determining factor here is that your other friend ended last season in B2.
alright thanks that clears it up
